school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: I loved this class. Took her as a dual enrollment student for both ENC 1101 and ENC 1102. Many people don\'t like her because she is a little curt at times, but if you are respectful, attentive, and show that you care about the class, she is absolutely willing to help you out. Instructions are sometimes unclear, but she usually has a rubric.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I took Professor Wise for Comp 2 online. Her assignment directions are very unclear. When i would email her and ask her for clarification, she was very condescending, as if it was wrong i couldn\'t understand her instructions. Despite this, it was a very easy class and didn\'t take much effort to do well in.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Her grading is so off; at times I\'d get 100% on one assignment but complete another assignment of similar length and get 50%, just based on the length. She\'s super unhelpful and half of her "instructions" made no sense. All of her comments on my assignments were full of grammar/spelling errors, and were not very "professional".

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  SO MANY PAPERS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Unclear as to what you are supposed to do for the assignments. Expects you to know APA which I personally have never had to use. She grades hard she tells you that everything is due on each Sunday but watch out it really isn\'t. Beware you will have to have photo editing capabilities and you will have to make a YouTube video. Uses a grade generator.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She\'s seriously one of those teachers that assigns you work online but doesn\'t ever mention anything about it. She spends her class period going over things that are unnecessary to the assignments and expects good work when her instructions don\'t clarify what should be done. The work is a lot of busy work and due date changes. I don\'t recommend.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Listen & you will learn a lot. Go to class & stay on top of assignments. Easy to fall behind. Expect to study grammar on your own--this is college folks. Prepare to write several essays; one research essay with references. Offered last minute extra credit. Be respectful. She will go out of her way to help you if you ask. Overall, good professor.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She literally does not explain anything. She tells you what sites are "helpful", but they really aren\'t. She does reply to emails even though it is an online course. She uses apa formatting and I myself have never used it before, she doesn\'t bother to explain it. She is very unclear and is of no help.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: This woman gives so many assignments throughout the class and yet most of them are not even graded until after the final class of the semester. Trying to figure out what your grade is? Good luck. Very unresponsive to emails and hardly even knows how to use canvas as it is.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: At first work load seems like a lot, but as long as you stay on top and don\'t get behind with the multiple assignments she gives in a week. Directions are kind of confusing to the assignments but when asking for help she explains it with you step by step one on one. Very little grammar presentations but lots of writing.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER  SO MANY PAPERS
comments: Respect her and shell respect you. Her class is very unorganized, but her assignments can be fun if you make the best out of them. Shes a sweet lady if you get to know her, just dont get on her bad side!! Easy quizes but havent taken midterm yet.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She is a BAD TEACHER! She doesn\'t know what she is doing, she never replies to emails, and her class is very confusing; however, it is easy. She is constantly changing due dates, she is a slow grader, and she even tends to lose/delete grades/assignments so some kids are stuck redoing assignments because of her mistakes.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Wonderful professor as long as you do the work and do it on time. Doesn\'t respond to emails very quick though. I had her for ENC 1101 too and attendance is mandatory. As long as you try you will do well.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She\'s a good teacher. We had to write 3-4 essays overall and she is easy to approach when you need help. She takes a while responding to emails though. We don\'t do much in class other than write our papers. I only used the text book about twice the whole semester. Overall, she\'s a good teacher.

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Good teacher as long as you do your work and do not interrupt her when she is talking. She is very helpful when it comes to assignments. Attendence is manadatory. Great teacher recommended her!

school_name: University of South Florida St. Petersburg
tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (9)  Tough Grader (6)  SO MANY PAPERS (5)  Gives good feedback (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Good teacher, as long as you stay on top of your work, she also allows frequent revisions to improve your grade. I\'m a bad English student but im doing well in this class.
